include:
Dear Hiring Manager, 

I found your job posting and wanted to enter myself as a candidate for the position you are offering. To give you a brief outline of who I am I will give you my highlights: 
 -- I am an ambitious programmer recently graduated from the University of Toronto
 -- Programming is my hobby you will see a lot of GitHub projects here which have all been developed as I constantly try to broaden my knowledge and improve at what I do. 
 -- I am very personable, working as part of a team and communicating effectively is just as important as individual coding and I pride myself on my teamwork. 
The rest of this cover letter is designed to let you know skills that I have that match your posting.
